template.name: New SilverStripe Page Type
template.description: A new SilverStripe Page type extending Page and Page_Controller

templates.template:
<?php
class ${file_name} extends Page {
    public static $$db=array(
                         );
    
    public static $$has_one=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$has_many=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$defaults=array(
                                );
    
    ${cursor}
}

class ${file_name}_Controller extends Page_Controller {
    
}
?>

<?php
class ${file_name} extends DataObject {
    public static $$db=array(
                         );
    
    public static $$has_one=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$has_many=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$belongs_many_many=array(
                                 );
    
    public static $$many_many=array(
                                 );
    
    public static $$defaults=array(
                                );
    
    ${cursor}
}
?>

template.name: New SilverStripe Controller
template.description: A new SilverStripe Controller extending ContentController

templates.template:
<?php
class ${file_name} extends ContentController {
    ${cursor}
}
?>

template.name: New SilverStripe 2.4 or earlier Extension
template.description: A new SilverStripe 2.4 or earlier Extension

templates.template:
<?php
class ${file_name} extends Extension {
    /**
     * Adds the extra statics for this extension
     * @return {array} Returns a multi-dimentional array defining extra statics and their values
     */
    public function extraStatics() {
        ${cursor}
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates the CMS fields adding the fields defined in this extension
     * @param {FieldSet} $$fields Field Set that new fields will be added to
     */
    public function updateCMSFields(FieldSet &$$fields) {
        
    }
}
?>

<?php
class ${file_name} extends Extension {
    ${cursor}
}
?>

<?php
class ${file_name} extends DataExtension {
    public static $$db=array(
                         );
    
    public static $$has_one=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$has_many=array(
                             );
    
    public static $$belongs_many_many=array(
                                 );
    
    public static $$many_many=array(
                                 );
    
    public static $$defaults=array(
                                );
    
    /**
     * Updates the CMS fields adding the fields defined in this extension
     * @param {FieldList} $$fields Field List that new fields will be added to
     */
    public function updateCMSFields(FieldList $$fields) {
        
    }
}
?>

}
?>

<?php
class ${file_name} {
    ${cursor}
}
?>

template.name: New SilverStripe 2.4 or earlier language file

templates.template:
<?php
global $$lang;

//$$lang['${file_name}']['EXAMPLE_CLASS']['MY_EXAMPLE']='My Example';
//$$lang['${file_name}']['Example.ss']['MY_EXAMPLE']='My Example';
?>

template.name: class
template.description: A SilverStripe Page type extending Page and Page_Controller

template.name: lang
template.description: A SilverStripe 2.4 or earlier language file template

templates.template:
global $$lang;
$$lang['${file_name}']['${scope}']['${key_name}']='${text}';

template.name: $lang
template.description: A SilverStripe language file line template

templates.template: $$lang['${file_name}']['${scope}']['${key_name}']='${text}';
Object::add_extension('${base_class}','${extended_class}');
Object::remove_extension('${base_class}','${extended_class}');

template.name: New Top Level SilverStripe Template
template.description: A new Top Level SilverStripe Template

templates.template:
$$MetaTags(false) <% base_tag %> <% require themedCSS(layout) %> <% require themedCSS(typography) %> <% require themedCSS(form) %>
<% include Navigation %>
$$Layout
<% if IsAdmin %> $$SilverStripeNavigator <% end_if %>

$$Title.XML

$$Content $$Form $$PageComments

template.name: New Top Level SilverStripe Template
template.description: A new Top Level SilverStripe Template

templates.template:
$$MetaTags(false) <% base_tag %> <% require themedCSS(layout) %> <% require themedCSS(typography) %> <% require themedCSS(form) %>
<% include Navigation %>
$$Layout
<% if $$IsAdmin %> $$SilverStripeNavigator <% end_if %>

$$Title.XML

$$Content $$Form
